A mysterious dark presence slips into the mansion of the elemental witches, sealing all five guardians inside enchanted paintings. With her unique powers, our heroine Hato sets out to release them from the creeping darkness.

Once freed, the grateful witches grow close to Hato, forming an intimate bond filled with playful teasing and warm affection. Eager to express themselves, they invite her to admire their alluring outfitsâ€”each one more charming and tempting than the last.

â¤ï¸â­â¤ï¸â­â¤ï¸â­Â  Â  Â Â FeaturesÂ  Â  Â Â â­â¤ï¸â­â¤ï¸â­â¤ï¸


Story Mode featuring 60 stages where you free the Guardian Witches

  • Charm Mode offers endless gameplay focused on chasing high scores

  • 8 playable characters with a total of 24 unique outfits

  • Each of the 5 Guardian Witches includes 1 ceremonial costume, 2 date outfits, and 1 swimsuit ğŸ‘™

  • Play as Hato, her companion Beet, or even the Darkness itself

  • Quick Save system lets you pause mid-run and continue later without losing progress
